sentence.Network_en: I have had very little help from doctors and no sympathy whatsoever.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从医生那里没有得到什么帮助，也未获得丝毫同情。

sentence.Network_en: I don't think they'll have any idea how I'm feeling. None whatsoever.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为他们并不了解我的感受，一点儿都不了解。

sentence.Network_en: I always thought the worst of myself and had no confidence whatsoever.
sentence.Network_cn: 我老是妄自菲薄，没有一点儿信心。

entry.tran: (用于名词词组后，强调否定陈述)丝毫，任何，无论什么
entry.def: You use whatsoever after a noun group in order to emphasize a negative statement.

example.ex: My school did nothing whatsoever in the way of athletics...
example.tran: 我的学校在体育方面无所作为。

example.ex: I don't think they'll have any idea how I'm feeling. None whatsoever...
example.tran: 我认为他们并不了解我的感受，一点儿都不了解。

means.word_mean: 1. one or some or every or all without specification;

sentences.sentence: "give me any peaches you don't want"
"cars can be rented at almost any airport"
"give me whatever peaches you don't want"

sentences.en: All things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you,do ye even so to them.
sentences.cn: 你想别人对你怎样,你就怎样对人。

sentences.en: I found him thoroughly unpleasant, with no redeeming qualities whatsoever.

sentences.en: She felt no lust whatsoever for him.
